DJ Yuna

Introduction

DJ Yuna, formerly known as Dayeon, Hari, Sindy/Hong Xue and Rai, is a South Korean model, DJ, and former singer. She is a former member of the girl groups Playa, UNIZ, and Weather Girls. She is also a former pre-debut member of PinkFantasy.
